summary: Highly enthusiastic, motivated, responsible, caring, dedicated and committed high school math educator with almost 19 years of experience, earning trust and respect from students, colleagues and administration.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Data Analysis for Regular and Honors; Algebra 1 for Regular and Honors; Intensified Algebra 1 for Regular and Honors; Geometry for Regular and Honors; Algebra 2 Honors; Bridge and Mastery Class in Data Analysis; 9th-12th grade; responsibilities include adhering to school policies, providing academic counseling, attending meetings and seminars, preparing lesson plans and assessments, and coordinating with parents and administration.

experience.title: High School Math Teacher
experience.description: Taught Geometry and Algebra (9th-11th); responsibilities include planning lessons, counseling students, attending meetings, preparing materials, and communicating with parents.

experience.title: High School Math Teacher
experience.description: Taught Geometry, Data Analysis, and Algebra 1; provided academic support and guidance; prepared lesson plans and materials; maintained parent communication.

experience.title: High School Math Educator
experience.description: Algebra 1 instruction; academic counseling; participated in meetings and parent conferences; developed lesson plans and instructional materials.

education.degree: Master of Arts in Math Education
Bachelor of Arts in Secondary Education Mathematics
